html:
2.24.23  1:08 pm   how do u feel about persons who start music as an adult?

      have u ever known someone who didn't really do music until they were grown
2.24.23  12:49 pm   what is your favourite colour of grass?
2.24.23  11:28 am   do you think having good handwriting is important
2.24.23  6:42 am   What's the difference (if any) between choosing "Down in Alabama and out in L.A." and choosing "Down in L.A. and out in Alabama" as song lyrics?
2.23.23  10:33 pm   why did you become a musician

2.23.23  6:12 pm   Cantaloupe, or pineapple on pizza?

      It's urgent.

     Thank you.

2.23.23  5:48 pm   For the middle section of "if the world doesn't end " where ut goes "its good its bad" I understand that it starts on a gmin7 then I think moves to a F#maj7/Ab on "been like that". But on "rearrangement " I can't work out what goes on in that bin but on the "yh" I know it settles on a f#maj7 but I'm wondering how u got there in terms of approaching it harmonically.

     Also for the " it's wrong its right " am I right in saying it goes from Cmin7add9

     to some variation on Bbmin7?

      I can hear a really sick synth slide to a C and F on "slipped into this new rhythm " which makes me think it could be a sus 2 or something on the Bb.

     It's by far my favourite middle section of yours though.
2.23.23  5:07 pm   Did you make the car sounds in "Perfect." with your mouth?
2.23.23  4:54 pm   Your music and videos have helped me through tough times, is there any advice you can give on how to get through the low points
2.23.23  4:10 pm   How many characters are in the next video?
2.23.23  1:57 pm   got any free music ideas

2.23.23  10:43 am   I'm beginning to feel as though everything I've made over the past decade is completely worthless and undeserving of attention. This feeling is also making me not want to continue creating things, even though I find joy in making them. How do I get out of this rut?
2.23.23  8:15 am   what do you think is your favorite song key
2.23.23  7:42 am   how does one get lucky

2.23.23  7:39 am   Are you able to identify your musical influences?

      I am basing my college project on you

2.23.23  1:22 am   i'm allergic to creative activities.

     how can i overcome this issue?
2.23.23  1:03 am   If someone learns something new, or forgets something, do they become a different person?
2.22.23  10:34 pm   why are you so cool?
2.22.23  10:31 pm   is it concerning that both me and my friend can recite the entirety of "HOW TO PULL A RABBIT OUT OF A HAT" with little to no effort
2.22.23  8:05 pm   Is accepting the offer of a donut the same as asking for a donut?
2.22.23  7:50 pm   how do you get motivation?
2.22.23  7:23 pm   Favorite planet?
2.22.23  6:47 pm   what were the origins of "where I've been"?

2.22.23  5:06 pm   is the next video longer than normal,

     or is it a normal length but it's way crazier than usual?

2.22.23  2:40 pm   What to do when it feels like my conquest to make something 'good' has left me in a lonely, deserted island where it feels like I've spent the past year working on one pixel in a 4K image?
2.22.23  12:56 pm   Do think daylight savings time still makes sense?
2.22.23  11:49 am   What is your third least favourite key on a piano?
2.22.23  11:25 am   What do you consider to be the greatest musical work of all time, and why?
2.22.23  10:14 am   could you make it so that the next song you upload have every letter of the alphabet on it?
2.22.23  5:25 am   For you, is singing and animating a piece of cake?
2.21.23  11:04 pm   i feel like im the freeloader in this group project, but i'm not like trying to be. i'm trying to work but i guess i'm just bad at it. what to do.
2.21.23  8:35 pm   in your recent videos you've modeled whole buildings and street corners. do you have a method to that?
2.21.23  8:25 pm   what is the most normal thing?

2.21.23  7:43 pm   what's the weirdest, wackiest thing you've done with time signatures in your music yet?

this
2.21.23  5:34 pm   opinion on cacti?
2.21.23  4:58 pm   What is the best sort of knowledge to acquire?
2.21.23  4:17 pm   how do you feel deadlines affect your ability to find inspiration? what about for finding general motivation?
2.21.23  1:37 pm   ive been playing songs by ear and memorization for so long that i am terrible at sight reading. what do i do
2.21.23  12:13 pm   how do i lower my impossibly high standards for things?

2.21.23  11:51 am   For "is that you on the stage?" I figured that for the "is that you on the" bit it's Ebmaj7 but for "stage" it's a bit hard to work out coz my ear was expecting ,upon my first listening of I like to wear soft clothing , to hear an fmajadd6 of some sort, but if seems to be a Gmaj7 instead, maybe a sus2 coz I can't hear a third really.

      I guess it's kinda like 9 8 7 (my favourite) where it took me forever to work out that the main verse is Dmin then Cmaj7sus2sus4 which is essentially G/C right?

      I feel like there might be a similar kinda thing going on in I like to wear soft clothing but idk
2.21.23  11:28 am   What's the thought process behind most of the lyrics?
2.21.23  10:14 am   What is your 15th least favourite book?
2.21.23  8:08 am   can we see the full chair chat from the beginning of 'here comes the sun'?
2.21.23  8:06 am   What do you do in your dreams
2.21.23  7:36 am   Hi Bill, would you ever consider writing a musical to be performed on a real stage?

2.21.23  2:57 am   it messes with some sometimes that life is completely random. we have no control over where and how we're born. I wish I grew up in a place and family that was less toxic, and more encouraging of kids pursuing arts. but i'm stuck in this almost suffocating situation. but then, would I even be interested in music - in a different life?
2.21.23  1:42 am   Are haikus art? They almost feel too easy to be considered as such.
2.21.23  1:11 am   why'd you wear different earbuds for the podcast the other day?

2.20.23  11:27 pm   everytime i seem to achieve a sense of extreme happiness, i immediately panic about it leaving. i want to feel that way forever. how do I focus on the happiness itself, instead of worrying about when it will leave? it seems impossible
2.20.23  10:47 pm   You seemed to have had a lot of motivational quotes on your wall in the studio you used from november 2010 to april 2011. Where did they come from?
